billhistory.lastaction: 03/30/2017 H Referred to Public Health: Mar 30 2017 1:18PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the continuation and functions of the Executive Council of Physical Therapy and Occupational Therapy Examiners, the Texas Board of Physical Therapy Examiners, and the Texas Board of Occupational Therapy Examiners; authorizing a fee.
